ing: 2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
des: "This fruit flavored sensation is nice and smooth, it goes down WAY too easy! This can also be made in a pitcher if serving a crowd."
ins: Pour raspberry vodka, watermelon vodka, orange vodka, strawberry vodka, sour mix, and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker is frosty. Strain into a highball glass and serve.
